heading: 3.1.2 Rarefication and Autocorrelation
text:
early GPS RSF studies, autocorrelation viewed issue directly
eliminate. last two decades, however, discourse around
autocorrelation become nuanced (Fieberg et al.¬†2021, Northrup et al.
2021). summarize current understanding, locations indeed ‚Äòserially
dependent‚Äô ‚Äì points closer time closer space (Fleming et al.
2014). However, locations taken regular intervals, 
representative space use (Fieberg et al 2021). Sampling locations 
regular intervals best practice habitat selection analyses. ,
autocorrelation bias reduce estimate uncertainty (SE). address
concern, using robust calculation confidence intervals can completed.

representing ecological processes. recommend using dredging

interpretation spurious results.
